rules.description: Mac OSX RDP: Home key to the beginning of the sentence (Command + Left)
Mac OSX RDP: End key to the end of the sentence (Command + Right)
Mac OSX RDP: Navigate to the beginning/end of the document (Command (+ Shift) + Up / Down)
Mac OSX RDP: Delete to start of line (Command + Delete)
Mac OSX RDP: Delete word (alias) (Option + Delete)
Mac OSX RDP: Jump between words  (Options + Left / Right)
Mac OSX RDP: Clipboard (Command + X / C /V)
Mac OSX RDP: Undo / Redo (Command (+ Shift) + Z
Mac OSX RDP: Select-All
Mac OSX RDP: Save
Mac OSX RDP: New
Mac OSX RDP: Reload browser page Command+R to F5
Mac OSX RDP: New Tab
Mac OSX RDP: Find in Files
Mac OSX RDP: Find
Mac OSX RDP: Find Next
Mac OSX RDP: Find Prev
Mac OSX RDP: Open
Mac OSX RDP: Close Window
Mac OSX RDP: Tab Naviation (Command + Shift + [ / ])
Mac OSX RDP: Increase / Decrease indent (Command + [ / ])
Mac OSX RDP: Visual Studio Code: Move Line Down
Mac OSX RDP: Visual Studio Code: Move Line Up
Mac OSX RDP: Visual Studio Code: Add Selection
Mac OSX RDP: Visual Studio Code: Open Palette
Mac OSX RDP: Visual Studio Code: Open File Palette
Mac OSX RDP: Visual Studio Code: Next problem in file
Mac OSX RDP: Visual Studio Code: Fix Issue
Mac OSX RDP: Visual Studio Code: Go to Symbol in File
Mac OSX RDP: Visual Studio Code: Go to Symbol in Workspace
Mac OSX RDP: Visual Studio Code: Comment Code

Mac OSX RDP: Browser open location (Ctrl+L)

Mac OSX RDP: Disable and track command+shift key (var)
Mac OSX RDP: Disable and track command+shift key
